p: The final outcomes of the incidents managed through the EU‚ÄêIMP differed significantly, depending on the nature of the issue and the robustness of the evidence. They ranged from maintenance of the unaltered marketing authorization (22% of cases) to its variation (46% of cases), through to its suspension (10% of cases) or revocation (9% of cases) (see Figure 9). One more recent issue is still ongoing at the time of this analysis.
